评论概述: Not a flattering dress on me
评论详情: I love the pattern of this dress and it looks just like pictures. It’s bright and fun. The fabric is lightweight and would be perfect to throw on in the summer and go. I don’t think this dress cut is flattering. I still have a belly after having my fourth kiddo and this dress accentuates that. The top also isn’t flattering in the chest area or around the collar. I have a long torso and short legs so the elastic band also hits in a weird spot.

I have two of these dresses and love them both. The smocked bodice makes it flattering and fits any shape. Being 6' tall, I wish it was longer, but I can't complain. It's light and flowy, yet not see through at all.

评论概述: beautiful color, but the body is a little short
评论详情: this dress is a gorgeous blue and the fabric is cool and pretty soft. Its well made, doesnt seem to shrink in the dryer,and has a nice flowy skirt. The body of the dress is a little short, so if you have a long torso the waistband would probably be a little to high, and there is a large gap for the sleeves, so your armpits will show. Overall, great dress,  but check your measurements to make sure you get a good size for you.

I am 4 months postpartum, and it has been so long since I felt like I really looked good in anything. I actually got a little teary when I put this on and looked in the mirror. I finally look good!! The elastic waistline hits just in the most flattering spot to maximize my figure and minimize my leftover baby pouch, even though I'm super busty (36G). I might get it in more colors when my baby is weaned (since it's not nursing friendly).  Some extra notes: no pockets, not stretchy, not see through, very airy in hot weather. I'm 5'7 and it hits 2 or so inches above my ankles.
